name: Tom,Tom The Piper's Son
lyric:
Tom Tom the piper's son
Stole a pig and away did run
The pig was eat
And Tom was beat
And Tom ran roaring
Down the street
Tom Tom the piper's son
Stole a pig and away did run
The pig was eat
And Tom was beat
And Tom ran roaring
Down the street

Tom Tom the piper's son
Stole a pig and away did run
The pig was eat
And Tom was beat
And Tom ran roaring
Down the street
